Seoul, South Korea , July 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As Amazon Prime Day approaches, SkinSeoul is launching its own bold counter-event, The Great Glow Up 2025, featuring even lower prices on top-rated Korean skincare products — with a guarantee to match Amazon's prices. The AI-powered Korean beauty startup is rapidly establishing itself as the go-to destination for K-beauty enthusiasts seeking real value and exclusive access to the most sought-after skincare brands. The Great Glow up 2025 SkinSeoul offers a wide selection of Korean skincare products, many of which have gained significant attention from customers during this Prime Day period. Among the highlights are two categories of standout products: those priced lower than Amazon's listings, and unique items that are difficult to find outside of SkinSeoul's platform. Several products have quickly become customer favorites due to their unbeatable discounts compared to Amazon, while others are regarded as hidden gems—trending skincare essentials that shoppers cannot easily purchase elsewhere. “We plan to invest in building a robust database for superior personalized experiences, expanding into 10 global markets, advancing AI agent technology, optimizing our distribution and fulfillment models, and enhancing our beauty marketing efforts,” said Kuenyoung Park, CEO of SkinSeoul. With The Great Glow Up 2025, SkinSeoul not only aims to provide exceptional deals but also to redefine how K-beauty fans worldwide discover and shop for skincare products during one of the year's biggest shopping events. In an aggressive pricing move, SkinSeoul has introduced a real-time price-matching policy that ensures every product is sold at a lower price than its equivalent on Amazon. If any product is found to be more expensive on SkinSeoul during Prime Day, customers are eligible for a price difference refund — no questions asked. “We don't just compete with Amazon — we aim to beat them,” said a SkinSeoul spokesperson. “The Great Glow Up 2025 should mean the best deals, and we're making sure our customers get exactly that.” - Examples of lowest-price favorites include: NEW Zero Pore Pad 2.0 Renewal Inner Cover Clip (medicube), Collagen Night Wrapping Mask (medicube), Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil - 200ml, 1pack (Anua), Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam (Anua), Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence - 100ml, 1pack (COSRX), Salmon PDRN Pink Collagen Jelly Gel Mask (medicube), Deep Vita C Capsule Cream (medicube), Collagen Niacinamide Jelly Cream (medicube), Revive Serum - 30ml, 1pack (Beauty of Joseon), Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream - 100ml, 1pack (COSRX). What sets SkinSeoul further apart is its unmatched catalog of Korean skincare. While Amazon carries a limited selection of K-beauty products, SkinSeoul offers a range of both classics and emerging trendsetters — including brands and SKUs that are hard to find anywhere else. From TikTok-viral items to up-and-coming indie labels, SkinSeoul gives customers first access to what's trending in Seoul's skincare scene. - Examples of hidden gems include: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Emulsion for Combination Skin (LANEIGE), Vita Collagen Ampoule (EUNYUL), Collagen Green Tea Ceramide Bounce Cream (INNISFREE), Daily Repair Toner (Dr.Belmeur), Hyaluronic Moisture Sun Cream SPF50+ PA++++ (INNISFREE), Vegan Sunscreen SPF50+ PA++++ (HYGGEE), Age Reviving Micro Crystal Patch Plus 3packs x (DERMAFIRM), Callus Multi Gold Lifting Cream (MEDIHEAL), Idebenone Sunblock (UltraV), Tone Up No Sebum Sunscreen EX SPF50+ PA++++ (INNISFREE). These highlights are just a glimpse — SkinSeoul's full catalog includes an even broader range of hard-to-find and competitively priced offerings, giving K-beauty fans a richer, more dynamic shopping experience than anywhere else. “As global demand for K-beauty grows, Amazon has struggled to keep up with the pace and depth of selection. That's where we come in,” the spokesperson added. “If you've seen it on Instagram or on Korean beauty YouTube — chances are, we have it, and we have it cheaper.” For more information or to explore The Great Glow Up 2025 deals, visit NEW Zero Pore Pad 2.0 Renewal Inner Cover Clip (medicube) About SkinSeoul SkinSeoul is an AI-powered Korean beauty startup committed to making premium K-beauty accessible, personalized, and affordable for customers worldwide. With a curated selection of top-rated skincare products, smart recommendations, and exclusive deals, SkinSeoul is revolutionizing the online beauty shopping experience. The company leverages cutting-edge AI and data analytics to deliver tailored skincare solutions while maintaining a strong focus on privacy, transparency, and customer trust. Press inquiries SkinSeoul Kuenyoung Park support@skin-seoul.com

If any product is found to be more expensive on SkinSeoul during Prime Day, customers are eligible for a price difference refund — no questions asked. “We don't just compete with Amazon — we aim to beat them,” said a SkinSeoul spokesperson. “The Great Glow Up 2025 should mean the best deals, and we're making sure our customers get exactly that.” - https://skin-seoul.com/campaign/ggu-lowest-price/ Examples of lowest-price favorites include: NEW Zero Pore Pad 2.0 Renewal Inner Cover Clip (medicube), Collagen Night Wrapping Mask (medicube), Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil - 200ml, 1pack (Anua), Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam (Anua), Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence - 100ml, 1pack (COSRX), Salmon PDRN Pink Collagen Jelly Gel Mask (medicube), Deep Vita C Capsule Cream (medicube), Collagen Niacinamide Jelly Cream (medicube), Revive Serum - 30ml, 1pack (Beauty of Joseon), Advanced Snail 92 All In One Cream - 100ml, 1pack (COSRX). What sets SkinSeoul further apart is its unmatched catalog of Korean skincare. While Amazon carries a limited selection of K-beauty products, SkinSeoul offers a range of both classics and emerging trendsetters — including brands and SKUs that are hard to find anywhere else. From TikTok-viral items to up-and-coming indie labels, SkinSeoul gives customers first access to what's trending in Seoul's skincare scene. - https://skin-seoul.com/campaign/ggu-hidden-gem/  Examples of hidden gems include: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Emulsion for Combination Skin (LANEIGE), Vita Collagen Ampoule (EUNYUL), Collagen Green Tea Ceramide Bounce Cream (INNISFREE), Daily Repair Toner (Dr.Belmeur), Hyaluronic Moisture Sun Cream SPF50+ PA++++ (INNISFREE), Vegan Sunscreen SPF50+ PA++++ (HYGGEE), Age Reviving Micro Crystal Patch Plus 3packs x (DERMAFIRM), Callus Multi Gold Lifting Cream (MEDIHEAL), Idebenone Sunblock (UltraV), Tone Up No Sebum Sunscreen EX SPF50+ PA++++ (INNISFREE). These highlights are just a glimpse — SkinSeoul's full catalog includes an even broader range of hard-to-find and competitively priced offerings, giving K-beauty fans a richer, more dynamic shopping experience than anywhere else. “As global demand for K-beauty grows, Amazon has struggled to keep up with the pace and depth of selection. That's where we come in,” the spokesperson added. “If you've seen it on or on Korean beauty — chances are, we have it, and we have it cheaper.” For more information or to explore The Great Glow Up 2025 deals, visit https://skin-seoul.com/campaign/ NEW Zero Pore Pad 2.0 Renewal Inner Cover Clip (medicube) About SkinSeoul SkinSeoul is an AI-powered Korean beauty startup committed to making premium K-beauty accessible, personalized, and affordable for customers worldwide. With a curated selection of top-rated skincare products, smart recommendations, and exclusive deals, SkinSeoul is revolutionizing the online beauty shopping experience. The company leverages cutting-edge AI and data analytics to deliver tailored skincare solutions while maintaining a strong focus on privacy, transparency, and customer trust. The sales on these beloved products could be gone before Prime Day is even over. Amazon Prime Day deals are here for four days this year, but that doesn't mean all your favorite products will be on sale for that full length of time. Popular products tend to sell out quickly when the discounts are this deep, so if you've had your eye on something, you don't want to miss your chance to grab it on sale. Below, we tracked down some of the most beloved products that are on sale right now — and all of these have historically sold out quickly. If you spot something on this list that you've been waiting to add to your cart, wait no more. A deal this good may not come around again for a while. Prices change quickly on Prime Day, so keep checking back to see the latest updates. Make sure to sign up for an Amazon Prime account to get the best deals. Stasher 10-piece reusable silicone storage bag set (40% off list price) Stasher's popular reusable storage bags can help you cut down on plastic waste (as well as the cost of buying single-use plastic bags), and we don't expect them to last long on the shelves. This 10-pack comes with bags in six different sizes, as well as four stretch lids. All are made with silicone and are safe for use in the dishwasher, freezer, microwave and oven. The TikTok-viral Meridian body hair trimmer (40% off list price) Rarely on sale for a price this low, this Meridian body hair trimmer is a viral product that may see a ton of orders this Prime Day (plenty of reviews mention first seeing it on TikTok). The trimmer can be used by both men and women, is 100% waterproof and promises a close shave without irritation, redness, ingrown hair, razor burn or bumps. It's cordless and rechargeable, and comes with an anti-nick guard to keep you safe. Cabeau TNE travel neck pillow (25% off list price) You might be familiar with Cabeau's popular neck pillows, and their TNE memory foam pillow will be on sale for Prime Day. Available in a bunch of different colors, this pillow is a must-have for flights, long train or car rides and more: It has seat straps you can attach to your chair to keep your head and neck in alignment, prevents your head from falling forward with "head catch" technology and is made with ergonomic memory foam. It also comes with a travel bag you can attach to your luggage. A bestselling absorbent and slip-resistant bath mat (50% off list price) An already affordable product just got an even better price. Gorilla Grip reports that their popular bath mat — which has 4.3 stars across more than 76,000 ratings — sold over 10,000 units in the past month alone, so with this half-off discount, we're expecting shoppers to flock here. Made with cozy, plush chenille, the absorbent bath mat has a textured rubber backing and is slip- and fade-resistant. It comes in so many sizes and colors, so you can match your bathroom's style and needs easily. Anua niacinamide 10 + TXA 4 serum (30% off list price) With the ongoing tariff situation potentially affecting the prices of Korean skin care and beauty products, as well as K-beauty's general popularity during Prime Day, we could see products like this Anua serum selling out. The brand reports that more than 40,000 units of the serum were bought in just the last month, too. Suitable for all skin types, the fragrance-free serum contains 10% niacinamide, as well as other skin-boosting ingredients like hyaluronic acid and ceramide to help your skin glow and provide hydration. The texture is described as lightweight and non-greasy, making this an easy add to any skin care routine. Lumineux teeth whitening strips (33% off list price) Yes, the ever-popular Crest 3D Whitestrips will be on sale for Prime Day (they appear elsewhere on this list), but we could also see this Lumineux alternative selling out too — it's garnered over 56,000 ratings with a 4.1-star average. These also come dentist-recommended for patients with sensitive teeth. The strips are enamel-safe and peroxide-free, relying on natural ingredients like coconut oil, lemon peel oil and more. Sol de Janeiro hair and body perfume mist (20% off list price) A constant Amazon beauty bestseller, we pretty much never see this Sol de Janeiro perfume mist on sale, so be prepared to grab it while you can. The mist comes in a ton of different scents, though the beachy, summer-ready Cheirosa '62 is probably the most well-known (it matches the viral Brazilian Bum Bum Cream scent, which also appears on this list). You can get a bottle in two sizes, including one that's travel-friendly. Blueair's newest air purifier (20% off list price) This Prime Day is the first time ever that Blueair's newest air purifier, the Blue Signature, is on sale, so you'll want to jump on this deal while you can. The purifier boasts seven stages of filtration, odor-blocking technology and an air quality indicator. You can control it using the accompanying app to set a schedule and get alerts for when the filter needs replacing. The purifier can clean up to 3,385 square feet and can even double as a table to make it multifunctional. Cocokind ceramide barrier serum (25% off list price) Another offering from a popular skin care brand, Cocokind's ceramide barrier serum can help soothe and hydrate the skin barrier using squalane and beta-glucan, as well as five ceramides. According to the brand, these ingredients can offer more hydration than hyaluronic acid, and with a comfortable, lightweight feel, the serum can layer with retinol, vitamin C and other skin care products and instantly absorb into the skin. HexClad 6-piece nonstick fry pan set (20% off list price) You're probably familiar with HexClad, the Gordon Ramsay-approved cookware brand. We could see this 6-piece set going quickly with the offered discount: It contains fry pans of three sizes (8-, 10- and 12-inch) as well as lids for each. The hexagonal nonstick surface provides an even sear and is easy to clean, not to mention dishwasher- and oven-safe up to 400 degrees....

SPR_COMBO[ja]　株式会社The Founders （本社：韓国ソウル）が展開する、グローバルスキンケアブランド「Anua（アヌア）」より販売中の『レチノール0.3ナイアシンリニューイングセラム/ 30ml』が、晋遊舎の本音のコスメ批評誌で人気の雑誌「LDK the Beauty」の2025年8月号（2025年6月20日発売）の「2025年上半期ベストコスメ」にて、レチノール美容液部門 第2位を受賞いたしました。 今回、ベストコスメを受賞した『レチノール0.3ナイアシンリニューイングセラム/ 30ml』は、リポソーム技術が適用された独自成分「AnuaレチノールTM＊3」に加え、「ナイアシンアミド＊2」を配合したダブル成分が特徴の美容液です。 こっくりとした濃密なテクスチャーが肌を包み込み、キメ・ハリ・くすみ＊4にアプローチし、なめらかな肌へとサポートします。 「LDK the Beauty」は、専門家や読者モニターが検証に参加し、忖度なしに評価する雑誌として知られており、今回の受賞は多くの方にご支持いただいた結果と受け止めております。 Anuaは、これからも信頼いただける製品づくりを通じて、一人ひとりの肌に寄り添ったブランドを目指してまいります。 全世界160ヵ国以上に愛されているAnuaの商品を、ぜひこの機会に、オンラインまたは全国のバラエティーショップでお試しください。 *1,2 全て整肌成分 *3 レチノール、セラミドNP、フィステロールズ(全て整肌成分) *4 乾燥によるもの 【調査概要】 掲載：『LDK the Beauty』2025年8月号 調査期間：2024年12月16日～2025年6月11日 調査方法：上記期間のテストで高評価を受賞した製品の中から、編集部が心から推薦できる製品を選定 ■受賞製品詳細 レチノール0.3ナイアシンリニューイングセラム 肌にハリやうるおいを与える「レチノール＊1」と、うるおいによって透明感を与える「ナイアシンアミド*²」をダブル配合し、肌に幅広くアプローチします。 気になる部分への集中ケアだけでなく、デイリーケアとしてもお使いいただけるよう、肌にやさしい使い心地を考えて開発されました。 *1,2 全て整肌成分 製品名：レチノール0.3ナイアシンリニューイングセラム 容量：30mL 価格：3,200円（税込） ■Anua（アヌア）とは Anua(アヌア)は、「優しく。 強く。」 をコンセプトに掲げ、原料にこだわりながらお客様の声に耳を傾けた製品づくりを目指したスキンケアブランドです。 ドクダミをはじめとする自然由来ラインからダーマラインまで多様なラインナップを展開し、肌タイプに合わせたスキンケアが楽しめます。 Anuaは2019年4月に韓国で誕生。 発売からわずか1年で韓国国内において多くの支持を集め、2021年にはグローバル市場へ本格展開を開始。 現在では欧米を含む160ヵ国以上に展開し、世界中の人々に愛されるブランドへと成長を遂げています。 【Anua公式サイト情報】 ■Anua 公式サイト : https://www.anuashop.jp/ ■Anua 公式Instagram :https://www.instagram.com/anua.jp/ ■Anua 公式Twitter : https://x.com/anua_official 【Anua公式販売ショップ情報】 ■ Anua 公式サイト : https://www.anuashop.jp/ ■ Qoo10 公式ショップ : https://www.qoo10.jp/shop/anua ■ 楽天市場 公式ショップ : https://www.rakuten.ne.jp/gold/anuajapan/ ■Amazon 公式ショップ : https://www.amazon.co.jp/stores/page/7AB81D93-3891-41EB-A58E-D2FE1D863A4D 配信元企業：株式会社The Founders JAPAN 企業プレスリリース詳細へ PR TIMESトップへ

SPR_COMBO[ja]  ©︎choigosim 「DECKS×チェゴシム　パワフルサマーバケーションinお台場」キービジュアル 東京・お台場の商業施設「デックス東京ビーチ」（以下、当館）では、2025年の夏イベントとして、SNS総フォロワー数が95万人を超える韓国発の人気キャラクターで、CHOCOLATE Inc.が日本展開を手がける「チェゴシム」（作者：チェゴシム氏）とタイアップした「DECKS×チェゴシム　パワフルサマーバケーションinお台場」（以下、本イベント）を2025年7月25日（金）から8月24日（日）までの期間限定で開催します。 本イベントでは、「チェゴシム」のグッズが手に入る期間限定ポップアップショップの開催をはじめ、当館オリジナルノベルティグッズが当たる抽選会や館内装飾など、 当館と「チェゴシム」だからこそ実現する、この夏限定の特別コンテンツを複数ご用意しております。 ■「DECKS×チェゴシム　パワフルサマーバケーションinお台場 」概要 2020年に韓国在住のイラストレーター・チェゴシム氏により生み出された、Z世代を中心に人気を集めている「チェゴシム」。 本イベントでは、当館の様々な場所で「チェゴシム」の世界観を堪能できる企画を多数ご用意しています。   期間：2025年7月25日（金）～8月24日（日） 場所：デックス東京ビーチ館内各所 ※コンテンツにより実施期間、場所が異なります ■何が当たるかドキドキ！「チェゴシム」お守りステッカープレゼント 期間中、館内の対象店舗（一部店舗除く）にて、1会計で1,500円（税込）以上ご利用いただいた方に、お守りステッカーをプレゼントします。 ここでしか手に入れることができない、当館と「チェゴシム」がコラボしたオリジナルデザイン2種を含む全5種のお守りステッカーをご用意しています。   期間：2025年7月25日（金）～8月24日（日） 場所：対象店舗（全52店舗） ※お会計時に店頭でお渡しします ※デックス限定絵柄キラキラ加工２種(左より２点)を含む全５種となり、ランダムに配布されるため、中身は選べません ※お一人様1会計につき1点まで、お会計金額の合算はできません ※数量限定のため、期間中でもなくなり次第終了となります ■かわいいグッズがいっぱい♡　「チェゴシム」POP UP SHOP 普段使いにもぴったりな「チェゴシム」のグッズを手に入れることができる「チェゴシム」グッズの公式ショップが期間限定でオープンします。 期間：2025年7月25日（金）～8月7日（木） 時間：11:00～20:00　※最終日のみ18:00まで 場所：シーサイドモール5階 レストラン広場 ■「チェゴシム」グッズが当たる！ジャイアントガチャ抽選会 左：チェゴシムグッズ　イメージ　右：オリジナルアクリルチャーム　イメージ 8月16日（土）、8月17日（日）、8月23日（土）、8月24日（日）の4日間限定で、 「チェゴシム」グッズが当たる「ジャイアントガチャ抽選会」を実施します。 当館の当日お買い上げレシート1,500円（税込）ごとに1回、抽選会にご参加いただけて、 当館でしか手に入らないイベント限定の「チェゴシム」オリジナルノベルティグッズや「チェゴシム」グッズなど、ハズレなしの豪華景品が当たります。   期間：2025年8月16日（土）、17日（日）、23日（土）、24日（日） 時間：12:00～19:00 場所：シーサイドモール5階 レストラン広場 ※レシートの合算は可能です ※お一人様1日3回までとなります ※数量限定のため、期間中でもなくなり次第終了となります ■お台場の夏を楽しむゴシムちゃんたちでデックス東京ビーチは大にぎわい！ 本イベント期間中、館内の入り口ドアでは、お台場の夏を楽しむゴシムちゃんたちが皆様をお出迎えします。 また、作者・チェゴシム氏描き下ろしのオリジナルイラスト付きフォトスポットの他、お手洗いや渡り廊下など館内各所に「チェゴシム」装飾が登場します。   期間：2025年7月25日（金）～8月24日（日） 場所：【フォトスポット】館内各所 【ウェルカムドア】アイランドモール3階・シーサイドモール3階 入り口（全5か所） 【装飾】館内各所  ...

It's the last call for the best Prime Day K-beauty deals! That's right, it's the final Amazon Prime Day, which means all the Korean beauty steals you've been eyeing will disappear after the clock strikes midnight (very Cinderella-core—am I right?) . Whether you open a tab to sleuth-shop at work or make a deciding move on a late-night scroll, there's still plenty of glowy skin-care products and innovative new makeup formulas up for grabs. And while Amazon likes to lean into its reputation of being the “Everything Store,” a targeted approach to scoping out the best Prime Day deals always pays off. Those shopping the beauty aisle should make the Prime Day K-beauty deals their first port of call. Why, you ask? Korean beauty products are renowned for their innovative formulas, skincare-first ingredients, and unique textures—in addition to being just an absolute treat to use and hold. From jelly-like serums and and whipped moisturizers that melt into skin to cushion compacts that snap shut with a satisfying click, there's a tactile delight to every step. Plus, who doesn't delight at super cute packaging? Korean beauty products are often not only wildly effective, but can also spark a bit of joy with each use. Vogue's Guide to the Best Discounted Amazon K-Beauty Products: Featured in this article Best Eye Cream Sulwhasoo Concentrated Ginseng Rejuvenating Eye Cream Jump to review “K-beauty revolves around nurturing [the skin] barrier–optimizing the hydration within and blocking out pollutants and environmental stressors,” Dr. Christine Hall, a general practitioner in medical aesthetics, previously told Vogue. “The whole regime centers around maximizing hydration of the skin or 'skin flooding' with product after product aimed at restoring the skin barrier and locking in hydration—no matter what your skin-type is.” It's hard to keep up with every single markdown that pops up at the 11th hour—but we're staying vigilant on all the K-beauty steals. In other words: we're doing the obsessive scrolling, so you have the pick of the lot. We've rounded up over 80 curated options of top-tier Korean beauty buys (plus a few new obsessions) to choose from right here, so all you have to do is tap “add to cart.” Happy shopping! The Best Prime Day Beauty Deals, By Category Sometimes you want to peruse the Amazon Prime Day deals, other times, you know exactly what you're looking for. To help you quickly find a specific item, we've broken our guide into categories below. Prime Day Korean Cleanser Deals The best Korean face washes typically focus on soothing, gentle ingredients. Whether you're opting for a cleansing oil to melt away makeup and SPF, or a hydrating foaming cleanser—either make a great first step in any routine. Though, ideally, you'll do both as part of the Korean cleansing method, a.k.a the lauded double cleanse. From balms to low ph gel, anyone of these picks will give you an effective cleanse, sans irritation. Banila Co Clean it Zero Original Cleansing Balm This pick was Vogue beauty shopping writer Conçetta Ciarlo's intro into the K-Beauty world back in her university days, before the category fully broke mainstream in the US. “A radom Amazon purchase in 2017 turned into a consistant favorite for me—just one scoop of the whipped-texture product lathers effortlessy, removing waterproof makeup with ease,” she says. CosRx Low pH Good Morning Gel Face Cleanser This gel cleanser is safe for all skin types to use, helping maintain the barrier rather than stripping it. Its pH-balanced and contains tea tree oil and BHA to soothe the skin and banish breakouts. Sulwhasoo Board-certified dermatologist Dr. Christina Chung is a fan of this gentle cleanser, noting that it's become a favorite for everyone in her family, from teens to elders. “Sulwhasoo products are generally ginseng-based and fabulous for sensitive skin types,” she previously told Vogue. Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil Chock full of anti-inflammatory, antibacterial ingredients like turmeric and heartland extract, this cleansing oil soothes while removing makeup and SPF. Post wash, skin feels fresh and hydrated skin, thanks to conditioning jojoba, grapeseed, and olive oils. Mixsoon This pH-balanced foam cleanser calms while it cleanses—perfect for sensitive, acne-prone skin. The combination of centella asiatica and salicylic acid, it soothes while gently exfoliating, to keep breakouts in check without stripping essential moisture. Torriden This ultra-gentle, pH-balanced face wash lathers away impurities. Infused with 8 types of low molecular hyaluronic acid, the formula delivers hydration while cleansing—making it a perfect match for sensitive or dehydrated skin....

I spend around 60000rs per year (20000rs every 4 months), for skincare and hair care both. So, around 5000rs a month. I have many EMIs plus medical bills but i also love my skin and know that I have to take care of myself to feel confident, so this is the amount i could live with, as my skincare budget for acne combination skin. I shop for 4 month supply so that I don't have to spend more than thrice a year. I buy most of my stuff on Amazon on discount (it's worth investing in a prime membership). OP, I will include my numbers here so that you can use the stats as you want to. FACE & NECK Oil cleanser, Anua - 800 x 2 Normal cleanser, biotique - 200rs x 4 Toner by moody - 200rs x 4 Salicilic acid serum by ROA - 250rs Niacinamide serum by pilgrim - 250rs Snail mucin cosrx - 1200rs x 2 Moisturiser by pilgrim - 175rs x 4 Under eye gel by blossom kochar - 200rs x 3 Sunscreen by plum - 500rs x 2 Sunscreen Lip balm, sugar pop - 100rs Overnight lip treatment, I have many but if you do your homework you can contain it within 500rs Once a week exfoliating face mask - 300rs x 2 BODY Dove body wash - 500 Body Moisturiser, biotique creamy coconut bottle - 110rs every week (I have very dry skin) so for 4 months - 1800rs Hand cream by Khadhi - 100 gm x 3 - 525rs Exfoliating body wash once a week, Chemist at play - 325rs Body oil from local herb store - 250rs x 2 Body Sunscreen - VLCC 500ml - 400rs (i work from home so I don't use this much) HAIR Pilgrim Rosemary spritz every other night - 150rs x 4 Preshampoo herbal oil, once a week - 250rs x 2 Loreal hyaluronic Shampoo - 250rs x 3 L'Oreal hyaluronic Conditioner - 250rs x 4 Tresemme hair mask, once a week - 250rs x 2 Tresemme Smoothening serum - 200rs Mousse during social outings - 400rs (Not including hair cut, make up and perfume budget here as it is a totally different topic!)

I think you should forgo the foundation altogether, it doesn't match you and actually adds a bit of an aged look because it crinkles your skin too much. I think people with freckles are very hard on themselves; and you don't realize how cute you are with freckles people try to make fake freckles to have what you have. Your skin is not aged, no wrinkles; you just need to take better care of your skin. Your skin is dull and prone to dryness from what I see, Invest in taking care of your skin, because you won't have to worry about aging if you moisturize properly and use the right products. I love Korean beauty products, they really uplift and hydrate your skin, I have glass skin from using the products every day for two weeks when I started my Korean beauty devotion— I would highly recommend using medicube, MISSHA, or ANUA skin care products, I myself use Medicube and MISSHA daily. I have never gone back to over counter products like neutrogena or even la roche possay literally it would be a disgrace and a dishonor to my skin. This is a beautiful start to long lasting plump, hydrated, and supple soft skin. For me; I use the Medicube PDRN PINK Salmon DNA serum, eye cream, milky toner, marshmallow whip facial cleanser, triple collagen cream, pink PDRN exosome micro needling serum and the PINK PDRN moisturizer then the MISSHA vitamin C and snail mucin toner for my face. You can get these from Amazon, I spent about $300 on my skin care products when I bought it for the first time using my intuition to draw me to what would be best for me. You honestly don't have to do that, in my opinion their products are very affordable and you could just get a simple set with the triple collagen cream, zero pore cleanser, PDRN serum, milky toner and the eye cream. Under $100 for all five. I didn't ever have to test another product if I did it was because I wanted to but I was already set with Medicube. Each product ranges from 10-18 dollars but I bought everything I could for added skin perfection. I wish I could show you how gorgeous and perfect my skin is. And I was breakout prone with dull skin and lots of blackheads. The texture is so perfect now. I never use foundation. I have it for if I want a matte finish since my skin is naturally dewy and glowy now, but I literally haven't used it for two years since I started using Korean beauty products. I promise you. Give it a try, you will not regret it. EDIT If you do want to get a good foundation that is super matched to your skin tone and color, try the IL MAKIAGE Foundation. Visit the website to answer a bunch of questions they choose a foundation color based on what you tell them (make sure you know your skin undertones, and skin color they are different) but initially you'll think they won't get it but I promise you they will send you your skin in a bottle. That's my spoil myself foundation, I've tried expensive ones like Christian Dior foundation etc I don't like them nearly as much as I like the Il MAKIAGE. It's the best one that you could use honestly or the Maybelline fit me for convenience they sell that everywhere in stores. Honestly it has great coverage is super affordable and for how cheap it is you get great color matching. They offer so many tones you seem to have warm rosy undertones in your skin tone, so you need a kinda pale foundation with a rosy warm tint, because you have a bit of tan in your undertones as well.
